This filter adds custom callouts for <https://learnr.academy> learning modules.

These callouts include:

:::{.callout-exercise icon=true}
A callout for writing exercise instructions
:::

:::{.callout-tip icon=false}
A callout for tips
:::

:::{.callout-question icon=true}
A callout for questions
:::
